column5: "Onyimpa ba
column6: kasa kyerɛ wo man ne mba
column8: Sɛ medze afona no ba asaase bi do
column9: na sɛ asaase no mu mba no yi barimba bi fi hɔn mu
column10: na wɔdze no si ɔweɔmfo ma hɔnho:"

column2: "na sɛ ber a obohu afona dɛ ɔreba asaase no do no
column3: ɔbɔ akasamu no mu dze bɔ ɔman no kɔkɔ"

column4: sɛ afona no ba
column5: na ɔfa no kɔ a

column4: no bɔgyaa bobua n'etsifi: naaso sɛ ɔfaa kɔkɔbɔ no a
column5: nkyɛ ɔagye ne kra nkwa."

column2: "Na sɛ ɔweɔmfo no hu dɛ afona no reba
column4: na ɔman no ennya nkaabɔ
column5: na afona no ba bɛfa nyimpa biara fi hɔn mu kɔ a; ɔnoara dze wɔafa no kɔ wɔ n'emumuyɛ mu
column6: naaso no bɔgyaa no mibebisa no wɔ ɔweɔmfo no nsamu."

column4: medze wo esi ɔweɔmfo ama Israelfo; dɛm ntsi tsie m'anomu asɛm
column5: na fa me nkaabɔ ma hɔn."

column4: wu ara na ibowu
column5: na ɔwo annkasa ammbɔ mumuyɛnyi no kɔkɔ emmfi ne bra ho a

column3: sɛ ɔwo ebɔ mumuyɛnyi no kɔkɔ wɔ ne bra ho dɛ ɔnsan mfi ho
column4: na ɔanndan emmfi ne bra ho a; obowu n'emumuyɛ mu
column5: na ɔwo dze agye wo kra nkwa."

column4: se Israelfo dɛ: Mbrɛ hom kasa nye yi
column5: dɛ
column6: Hɛn mbrato na hɛn bɔn hyɛ hɛn do
column7: na yɛafomfɔn wɔ mu; yebesi dɛn koraa atsena ase?"

column4: EWURADZE Nyankopɔn na ɔse
column5: Minnyi enyigye wɔ mumuyɛnyi no wu mu; na mbom dɛ mumuyɛnyi bɛdan efi ne bra ho na oenya nkwa a: hom nsan
column6: hom nsan mfi hom bra bɔn no ho; na ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na hom bowu

column4: se wo man no ne mba no dɛ
column5: Ɔtseneneenyi ne ndzeyɛtsenenee renngye no wɔ ne mbrato da no mu; na mumuyɛnyi n'emumuyɛ dze
column6: orinnsian ɔno ntsi mma ɔnnhwe ase wɔ da a ɔbɛsan efi n'emumuyɛ ho no: eso nyia ɔyɛ tseneneenyi no nam dɛm do runntum ntsena ase wɔ da a ɔbɛyɛ bɔn no mu."

column2: "Sɛ mese tseneneenyi dɛ obenya nkwa ara ampa a; sɛ ɔtwer ne ndzeyɛtsenenee
column4: wɔrennkaa ne ndzeyɛtsenenee no mu biara; na emumuyɛ a ɔayɛ no
column5: ɔnoara mu na obowu."

column4: Owu na ibowu; na sɛ ɔsan fi no bɔn ho
column5: na ɔyɛ dza ɔfa mbra mu na ɔtsen a;"

column2: "sɛ mumuyɛnyi no dan ahobadze no ma
column4: ɔnantsew nkwa ahyɛdze no do
column5: dɛ ɔnnyɛ emumuyɛdze a; nkwa ara na obenya

column2: "Wɔrennkaa no bɔn a ɔayɛ no mu biara nntsia no: ɔayɛ dza ɔfa mbra mu na ɔtsen; nkwa ara na obenya."
"Naaso wo man ne mba no wɔse dɛ
column3: EWURADZE n'amambu nnsaa: na hɔn dze
column4: hɔnara na hɔn amambu nnsaa."

column2: "Sɛ tseneneenyi san fi ne ndzeyɛtsenenee ho
column4: no mu ara na obowu."

column2: "Na sɛ mumuyɛnyi san fi n'emumuyɛ ho
column3: na ɔyɛ dza ɔfa mbra mu na ɔtsen a
column4: ɔnam do benya nkwa."
mubobu hom atsɛn dɛ mbrɛ hom mu biara n'abrabɔ tse."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ hɛn ndɔmmumkɔ afe a otsia duebien no
column4: bosoom no ne da a otsia enum no mu
column5: na obi a oguanee fi Jerusalɛm mu baa mo hɔ

column2: "Afei EWURADZE nsa baa mo do ewimbir no
column3: ansaana nyia oguanee no reba; aber a ɔbaa mo hɔ anapa no
column4: nna oebue m'ano dada; na m'ano buei na mutumii kasaa bio."

column5: "Onyimpa ba
column6: hɔn a wɔtse Israel asaase do ekurofo mu no ka dɛ
column8: na onyaa asaase no tsenaa do: na hɛn dze
column9: yɛdɔɔ so; wɔdze asaase no ama hɛn dɛ egyapadze."

column3: Mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Hom dze bɔgya ka ho dzidzi
column4: na hom ma hom enyi do hwɛ hom abosom
column5: na hom ka bɔgya gu: aso hom bɛfa asaase no ayɛ homdze?"

column4: na hom mu biara gu ne nyɛnko yer ho fi: aso hom bɛfa asaase no ayɛ homdze?"

column3: Mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Metse ase yi
column4: ampaara hɔn a wɔwowɔ ekurofo no do no bɔtotɔ afona ano
column5: na nyia ɔwɔ haban petee mu no
column6: medze no bɛma mbowa ma woeedzi
column7: na hɔn a wɔwowɔ aban adzendzen na etu mu no

column2: "Na mebɛma asaase no ayɛ amamfo na ahobowdze
column3: na no tum no nkontompɔ no bɔbɔ adze; na Israel mbepɔw bɛyɛ afo
column4: ma biara runndua do."

column3: ber a mayɛ asaase no amamfo na ahobowdze no
column4: osian hɔn ekyiwadze nyinara a wɔayɛ ntsi."
wo man ne mba keka wo ho asɛm wɔ afasu ho na adan mbobow ano
column5: na obi kasa kyerɛ obi
column9: hom mbra mbetsie asɛm kor a ofi EWURADZE nkyɛn aba."

column2: "Na wɔba wo nkyɛn dɛ man bi ba
column3: na wɔtsenatsena w'enyim dɛ me man
column4: na wotsie wo nsɛm
column5: na wɔnnyɛ: osiandɛ wɔdze hɔn ano kyerɛ dɔ pii

column4: etse dɛ obi a ne ndze fenemfenem na onyim sanku bɔ papaara
column5: no ndwom dɛdɛɛdɛw ma hɔn: osiandɛ wɔtse wo nsɛm

column4: ɔbɛba
column5: ) nna wobohu dɛ nkɔnhyɛnyi atsena hɔn mu pɛn."
